description: This Java class 'EventService' is a service layer component in a Spring-based backend application that manages event entities. It provides methods for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting events, utilizing repositories for persistence, a mapper for DTO conversions, and includes validation logic for event dates and capacity constraints.

classes.name: EventService
classes.description: Service class for managing events, including creating, listing with filters, retrieving, updating with validation, and deleting events in a Spring application.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new event after validating start and end times; converts DTO to entity and saves it.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of events filtered by optional parameters: date range, organizer, and tags.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Fetches a specific event by its ID, throwing NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing event, validating dates and ensuring capacity isn't decreased below current attendance.

methods.name: validateDates
methods.description: Helper method to ensure the end date is after the start date.
